column2: this was the best dining experience I've had in a while. My boyfriend and I came in at 8 on a Friday and were seated at a table near the bar. The layout is different
column3: but I like it. The tables are well spaced
column4: so you aren't having a conversation with everyone else sitting next to you
column5: but you still feel like it's a cozy atmosphere. They have these warm inviting circular booths--perfect for a group of 4-6. Can't wait to take out clients or have a dinner with a group.
